entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy. Showers in the Mary's Harbour area this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
